channel.title: Range bonuses don't work!
channel.description:
hey does anyone know how to fix range hits? iv add like max bonuses and it still has the same hits if it has non.
and also how do i make it so there is no range distance so i could be in edge wildy and ranging someone in lumby?
thanks
